Detailed Description

Schedules couriers to take on jobs.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void JobScheduler::addInitialRunnable (  Runnable  newRunnable  )  [pure virtual]
 

Adds a runnable that should be in the schedule queue.

Use this to setup runnables for scheduler and if you want to reschedule a runnable use JobSchedule::addRunnable instead.

Implemented in ProviderPrioScheduler, and FIFOJobScheduler.

virtual void JobScheduler::addRunnable (  Runnable  finished  )  [pure virtual]
 

Add a runnable back to the scheduler so it can be reused again.

Parameters:
finished A runnable that finished with its work and ready to take on new jobs.

Implemented in ProviderPrioScheduler, and FIFOJobScheduler.

virtual Runnable JobScheduler::getRunnable (  const Packet &  job  )  [pure virtual]
 

Return a runnable to be used with the packet.

Parameters:
packet A job to be handled by the runnable.
Returns:
A runnable that can handle the job.

Implemented in ProviderPrioScheduler, and FIFOJobScheduler.
